channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter picked bags by bin 0337, Barnett Way, Barnwood, by the path leading to Sainsburys., 30th January
item.description:
Email of 29/1/26 1527 hours- Hello I am a volunteer litter picker and have left a bag of recyclable tins, plastic etc by bin 0337, Barnett Way, Barnwood, by the path leading to Sainsburys. Is it possible to pick it up some time? Please note, that the bin is overflowing and there is also a Sainsburys bag

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Welveland Lane, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Litter picking bags ready for collection

item.title: Huge hole in road near roundabout, 30th January
item.description:
The whole road from the roundabout up to the racecourse needs addressing. People are driving dangerously downhill, moving into the other side of the road to avoid hole while both sides have massive holes everywhere. Please fix immediately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and Scooter dumped, 30th January
item.description:
Someone has flytipped a mattress and scooter in the woodland at the back of the field.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, Roman Hackle Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 30th January
item.description:
